TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DnsPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class DnsPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class DnsPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type DnsPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制存取網路上的網域名稱系統 (Domain Name System，DNS) 伺服器的權限。

span.span: Controls rights to access Domain Name System (DNS) servers on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設權限會允許所有的本機和內部網路區域的應用程式存取 DNS 服務和網際網路區域應用程式的任何 DNS 權限。The default permissions allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access DNS services, and no DNS permission for Internet zone applications.

public: DnsPermission(System::Security::Permissions::PermissionState state);
new System.Net.DnsPermission : System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState -> System.Net.DnsPermission

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體，它會允許不受限制的 DNS 存取或不允許 DNS 存取。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class that either allows unrestricted DNS access or disallows DNS access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`state`已，則執行個體將傳遞所有的需求。If `state` is , the instance passes all demands. 如果`state`包含任何其他值，執行個體失敗的所有要求。If `state` contains any other value, the instance fails all demands. ## Examples 下列範例建立的執行個體類別。The following example creates an instance of the class. summary.span: 建立目前使用權限執行個體的相同複本。

span.span: Creates an identical copy of the current permission instance.

returns.span: 類別的新執行個體是目前執行個體的相同複本。

span.span: A new instance of the class that is an identical copy of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份執行個體會提供給 DNS 伺服器與原始的權限執行個體相同的存取。A copy of a instance provides the same access to DNS servers as the original permission instance. ## Examples 下列範例會建立一份完全相同的現有執行個體。The following example creates an identical copy of an existing instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回可讓這兩個目前所定義的存取權的執行個體執行個體和指定執行個體。The method returns a instance that allows the access defined by both the current instance and the specified instance. 任何要求都必須通過兩個傳遞其交集的權限。Any demand must pass both permissions to pass their intersection. ## Examples 下列範例會建立目前權限執行個體的交集的權限執行個體和指定的權限執行個體。The following example creates a permission instance that is the intersection of the current permission instance and the specified permission instance. summary.span: 判斷目前使用權限執行個體是否為指定使用權限執行個體的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission instance is a subset of the specified permission instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前執行個體為指定的子集執行個體，如果目前執行個體會指定完全包含一組的作業指定執行個體。The current instance is a subset of the specified instance if the current instance specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified instance. 如果方法會傳回`true`，目前執行個體，可讓 DNS 伺服器沒有更多存取比指定執行個體。If the method returns `true`, the current instance allows no more access to DNS servers than does the specified instance. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以判斷目前的使用權限執行個體是否為指定的權限執行個體的子集。The following example uses the method to determine whether the current permission instance is a subset of the specified permission instance. span.span: Creates a permission instance that is the union of the current permission instance and the specified permission instance.

returns.span: 執行個體，表示目前 執行個體和指定 執行個體的聯集。

span.span: A instance that represents the union of the current instance with the specified instance.

span.span: If the current instance or is unrestricted, this method returns a instance that is unrestricted; otherwise, it returns a instance that is restricted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回定義由目前的執行個體，以允許存取執行個體或指定執行個體。The method returns a instance that allows the access defined by either the current instance or the specified instance. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下列範例會建立目前權限執行個體的聯集的權限執行個體和指定的權限執行個體。The following example creates a permission instance that is the union of the current permission instance and the specified permission instance.
